statements: SELECT * FROM BusinessIntelligenceReports ORDER BY report_id DESC
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM BusinessIntelligenceReports WHERE report_id = 3
SELECT report_content FROM BusinessIntelligenceReports WHERE report_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM BusinessIntelligenceReports ORDER BY report_date ASC, report_name DESC
SELECT report_id, report_name FROM BusinessIntelligenceReports
SELECT * FROM BusinessIntelligenceReports ORDER BY report_date DESC, report_id ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM BusinessIntelligenceReports WHERE report_id > 5 AND report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT report_id, LENGTH(report_name) AS name_length FROM BusinessIntelligenceReports WHERE report_date > '2022-06-01' ORDER BY name_length DESC
SELECT * FROM BusinessIntelligenceReports WHERE report_content LIKE '%important%'
SELECT COUNT(report_id) AS total_reports FROM BusinessIntelligenceReports
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 100;
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, order_date FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_address LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS order_count FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY order_count DESC;
SELECT customer_name, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM customers INNER JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name ORDER BY total_spent DESC;

SELECT customer_name, customer_email, order_date, total_amount FROM customers INNER JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM bi_reports
SELECT report_name, create_date FROM bi_reports
SELECT source_name, source_type FROM data_sources
SELECT report_id, report_name, report_date, total_records FROM report_data
SELECT * FROM report_data WHERE total_records > 100
SELECT report_name, report_description FROM bi_reports WHERE report_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM report_data WHERE total_records > 100 ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT report_name, report_description, create_date FROM bi_reports WHERE create_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT source_name, connection_string FROM data_sources WHERE source_type = 'SQL Server' ORDER BY source_name ASC;
SELECT report_name, total_records FROM bi_reports INNER JOIN report_data ON bi_reports.report_id = report_data.report_id WHERE report_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM business_intelligence;
SELECT id, name, role FROM business_intelligence WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT MAX(salary) AS max_salary FROM business_intelligence;
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM reports WHERE status = 'Approved';
SELECT metric_name, value FROM metrics ORDER BY date_recorded DESC;
SELECT * FROM business_intelligence;
SELECT name, department, role FROM business_intelligence WHERE salary > 50000;
SELECT source, date_collected, location FROM big_data ORDER BY date_collected DESC;
SELECT id, report_name, report_date, analyst FROM reports WHERE status = 'Approved';
SELECT metric_name, metric_type, value, date_recorded FROM metrics WHERE date_recorded BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM business_intelligence_reports;
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM business_intelligence_reports WHERE report_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT MAX(duration_minutes) AS longest_duration FROM data_sources_usage;
SELECT analyst_name, analyst_department FROM data_analysts WHERE analyst_department = 'Data Science';
SELECT source_name, source_type FROM big_data_sources ORDER BY source_name DESC;
SELECT report_name, report_date, report_data FROM business_intelligence_reports WHERE report_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM big_data_sources ORDER BY source_name DESC
SELECT analyst_name, analyst_department FROM data_analysts WHERE analyst_department = 'Analytics'
SELECT r.report_name, r.report_date, e.execution_date, e.execution_status FROM business_intelligence_reports r JOIN report_executions e ON r.report_id = e.report_id

SELECT s.source_name, a.analyst_name, u.usage_date FROM big_data_sources s JOIN data_sources_usage u ON s.source_id = u.source_id JOIN data_analysts a ON u.analyst_id = a.analyst_id ORDER BY u.usage_date ASC
